thread.title: Unique Beatles recording discovered
thread.title_full: Unique Beatles recording discovered | Granada - ITV News

author: itv.com
title: Unique Beatles recording discovered
text:
An original recording of The Beatles in 1962 that was discovered in a desk drawer is to go under the hammer. The band were filmed by a Granada Television crew at the Cavern in Liverpool performing “Some Other Guy” and “Kansas City”. However due to sound problems the recording was never shown and ended up in a drawer.
The tape has lain undiscovered for more than 50 years Credit: Adam Partridge Auctioneers The tape is going to be played at the Cavern Club before then going under the hammer at Adam Partridge Auctioneers in Liverpool with proceeds from the sale being donated to charity.
The Beatles meet Princess Margaret in 1964 Credit: pa Last updated Thu 8 Oct 2015 Entertainment Liverpool Cumbria
